containing_words.word: 中国教育和科研计算机网

sentences.english: The demand of the teacher what kind of teach a research?
sentences.chinese: 教师需要什么样的教科研？

sentences.english: We regard scientific research as the first driving force of the reform and development of education.
sentences.chinese: 学校把教科研工作作为教育改革与发展的第一推动力。

sentences.english: Teach a research why actually service?
sentences.chinese: 教科研究竟为什么服务？

sentences.english: Cultivating academicians mainly depends on the most famous university, scientific research institution and the great masters.
sentences.chinese: 培养院士主要靠最著名的大学和科研机构，靠大师。

sentences.english: Library is an important composition part of teaching and scientific research in college and university.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校图书馆是高校教学科研工作的重要组成郑分。

sentences.english: Any company that cuts back on research and development is killing the goose that lays the golden egg.
sentences.chinese: 那些削减科研费用的公司，等于是在杀鸡取卵。

sentences.english: The College is located on the north campus of the university.
sentences.chinese: 化学与材料科学学院的教学和科研活动在北校区进行。

sentences.english: The research team also studied a group of volunteers who watch birds for fun.
sentences.chinese: 该科研小组还研究了一群以观鸟为乐的志愿者。

sentences.english: sonic flights are restricted to military and research aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 只有军事和科研飞机允许音速飞行。

sentences.english: In order to promote the practical teaching activities of piano music .
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的目的是提高我们的钢琴教学和科研活动。

sentences.english: We will promote integrated military and civilian development, increase defense-related research, and strengthen the development of weapons and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 推动军民融合式发展，加强国防科研和武器装备建设。

sentences.english: The Academy of Military Sciences shoulders heavy scientific research missions and has a heavy workload.
sentences.chinese: 军事科学院军事理论科研任务繁重，工作强度大。

sentences.english: Another aspect goes to the allocation & optimization of agricultural investment resources in grain section.
sentences.chinese: 农业科研资源配置优化的另一层面是在粮食部门内部。

sentences.english: It is composed of the original management, scientific research, sales and skilled technical workers of DOFAMA.
sentences.chinese: 由原东方电工科研，营销，管理层，技术人员组成。

sentences.english: He is fortunate to have a job in the research lab, where they are studying Lyme disease.
sentences.chinese: 他很幸运地在研究淋巴疾病的科研室找到了一份工作。

sentences.english: Responsible for the teachers' training and education scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 负责学校的教师培训和教科研工作。
